review_title: Can accelerate learning if you can take the stress
pros: Communities at the centre. Innovative working styles. Warm work culture.
cons: Too dynamic and may disrupt work-life balance for some. Needs a stronger system to (1) allow for a  clear dialogue and redressal of grievances across the board; and (2)  ensure all employees feel valued according to their respective contributions.

review_title: I have never seen such a cooperative work culture before
pros: The team works as a family with extremely caring and supporting reporting managers. Great place to innovate and learn. They don't just promote health and wellness, they abide by that.
cons: Finances and reimbursements are often delayed. If you are a team worker and not a sole driver - your role in the communications department will be meaningless.
